about_the_game:
A pack of legacy Tales game battle BGMs you can set as normal battle music.

Content includes:
• Series BGM Pack (ToP)
TAKE UP THE CROSS
FIGHTING OF THE SPIRIT
DECISIVE

• Series BGM Pack (ToD)
Bare its fangs
Lion－Irony of fate
Common destiny

• Series BGM Pack (ToE)
INFERIA BATTLE
MID BOSS2
ETERNAL MIND

• Series BGM Pack (ToD2)
THEME OF BATTLE
DONA NOBIS PACEM
WHEEL OF FORTUNE

• Series BGM Pack (ToS)
Full force
Like a glint of light
Fatalize

• Series BGM Pack (ToR)
Battle organization
The die is cast
The trial

• Series BGM Pack (ToL)
Battle / Artist
Seeking Victory
Raging Nerifes

• Series BGM Pack (ToA)
The arrow was shot
Never surrender
Awkward justice

• Series BGM Pack (ToI)
Carve a Path with Your Sword
Plunge Forth with Your Sword
Smash with Your Sword

• Series BGM Pack (ToV)
Outbreak of Battle
Dauntless
Sparks Flying

• Series BGM Pack (ToH)
Somas, Legendary Arms
Surpass Your Limits
Fly! Anti-Air!

• Series BGM Pack (ToG)
Whet the Sheath
All on the Line
Rise to the Challenge

• Series BGM Pack (ToX)
Clench Your Fist
Intrepid Sword
Believe in Yourself

• Series BGM Pack (ToX2)
Charge by Swordpoint
Swing a Protective Hammer
Bet on the Last Guidepost

• Series BGM Pack (ToZ)
Express Yourself with Your Sword
Trueshot
Fearsome Being

• Series BGM Pack (ToB)
Shout your soul
The way of the embodied dragon
Daemon's assault

*This content will be available in-game after claiming it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.
*You can listen to battle tracks and configure which ones you want to use in Settings.

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Tales of Arise - Tales of Series Battle BGM Pack - $27.99

package_groups.title: Buy Tales of Arise - Tales of Series Battle BGM Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: A pack of legacy Tales game battle BGMs you can set as normal battle music.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
